thread.title: Re: WAIT WUT?! Brandon Morse shares disturbing ANTIFA sign WARNING people not to date whites (seriously)
thread.title_full: Re: WAIT WUT?! Brandon Morse shares disturbing ANTIFA sign WARNING people not to date whites (seriously)

author: IBXNJ
title: Re: WAIT WUT?! Brandon Morse shares disturbing ANTIFA sign WARNING people not to date whites (seriously)
text:
Yeah, kinda. There would be buildings on fire if this sign had been written about any other race. @TheBrandonMorse @TheRoadbeer I like that they warned against spreading racism. Nice touch 
DON’T DATE WHITES because they’re racist. 
If we don’t laugh we’ll never stop crying – the stupid burns! @TheBrandonMorse Shocking to see such a thing in print–should be "all right." 
— Ramspace (@ramspacek) February 3, 2017 
Agreed. 
Let’s be honest, most of us already knew this was likely the mantra of AntiFA, but to see it in print is exceptionally disturbing. 
What a stupid time to be alive. 
Editor’s note: The editor who wrote this piece married a white dude nearly 20 years ago … if only someone had warned her. Heh!
